data.title: This is the main title.... No loop here!

looper.inloop_description: **Once upon a time** there was a ~~little~~ princess... It was a tiny princess! You could hardly see her.
Then the **giant** with the *big feet* came... Ooohhh... the humanity.

looper.inloop_title: A splut sound is never good news
looper.inloop_description:
Are crackling **splut sound** was the last we've heard.... 
You guessed it... ~~The princess was no more!~~ That does it!

subloop.subloop_title: What he said! This does it!
Is this really how the story evolved?
